dcterms:description: A multi-modal dataset for autonomous driving that includes 2D vectorized maps and 1000 scenes, with 700 designated for training and 150 for validation. Each scene encompasses 20 seconds of 2Hz RGB images captured by 6 cameras.
dcterms:title: nuScenes

dcterms:description: Next generation datasets for self-driving perception and forecasting, consisting of 3D vectorized maps and 1000 logs, with 700 allocated for training and 150 for validation. Each log comprises 15 seconds of 20Hz RGB images from 7 ring cameras.
dcterms:title: Argoverse2
